title: When I load in game my keybinds Do Not Work
body: I have lost quiet a few games recently because after I load into game I cannot use my abilites or keybinds.  I have lost quiet a bit of LP over this and it is ridiculously frustrating.  I am not using any 3rd party programs or modifying anything in my LoL.  This has started to become a HUGE problem.  Can you please fix this?

replies.body:
This may be caused by a corrupted input file associated with your account. I recommend resetting this by logging into League, then go to your install directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the folder named **Config**. After you've done that, hop into a custom match to confirm the changes went through.

Let me know if this helped.
this does not work, FIX IT PLEASSE
I think we may be missing a bit of context around this issue. Do you see any *attempting to reconnect* message or minions/champions teleporting, running in place, or slow downs/speed ups in-game?
Please help, this is becoming a large issue.  I would like to be able to play every game from start to finish and not have to be down 5 minutes of cs/$$
